PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-09502022-09-15,  ,  MHA,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of ANNE ELIZABETH LAPOINTE of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective March 7, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
precis: Re-appointment of ANNE ELIZABETH LAPOINTE of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective March 7, 2023.
